articles.title: US News Highlights: Biden's Clean Energy Push and Trump's Legal Battles
articles.description: The Biden administration released guidance for clean energy tax credits, while a new Cyber Trust Mark rates internet device security. Seattle fires a police officer over a student's death. The Oregon ban on secret recordings is upheld. Trump's legal woes continue, including a block on a prosecutor's report.
articles.content:
The Biden administration finalized guidelines for clean energy tax credits, part of efforts to combat climate change amidst potential challenges from President-elect Donald Trump's pro-fossil fuel stance.

articles.title: Jon Stewart says Kamala Harris confirming Donald Trump's win is "like attending your own funeral"
articles.description: In Jon Stewart's first episode of "Daily Show" this year, he pointed fun at the Jan. 6 anniversary
articles.content:

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Meta's Content Policy Overhaul: A Shift Toward Free Expression
articles.description: Meta Platforms is dismantling its U.S. fact-checking program and altering content moderation policies in response to criticism from conservatives. The move comes as Mark Zuckerberg aims to repair relations with President-elect Trump. These changes prioritize free speech and reduce proactive content scanning on platforms like Facebook and Instagram.
articles.content: Meta Platforms, the social media giant, announced a significant policy shift affecting its U.S. operations. The company is scrapping its fact-checking program and reducing restrictions on controversial topics, citing a desire to promote free expressi... [562 chars]

articles.title: Soldier who exploded Tesla Cybertruck outside Trump hotel 'used generative AI to plan attack'
articles.description: Police in Las Vegas say they have reviewed Matthew Livelsberger's AI searches prior to the explosion outside Trump's hotel on New Year's Day.
articles.content:
A soldier who exploded a Tesla Cybertruck outside the Trump hotel in Las Vegas used generative AI - including ChatGPT - to help plan the attack, police have said.

articles.title: Judge Aileen Cannon temporarily blocks release of special counsel report on Trump classified documents case
articles.description: The Florida jurist ordered the Department of Justice to keep the report sealed until an appeals court can assess objections to its release lodged by Trump and two co-defendants.
articles.content:
Federal District Court Judge Aileen Cannon on Tuesday temporarily blocked the release of special counsel Jack Smith’s final report on his probes of President-elect Donald Trump.

articles.title: Trump's Greenland acquisition remarks spark concern
